statements: DELETE FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101 AND feedback = 'Negative feedback';
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE behavior_analysis = 'Aggressive' AND customer_id = 201;
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'positive');
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM feedback_analysis WHERE feedback_rating < 3);
DELETE FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 AND feedback_text = 'Negative feedback';
